Name: Mud Jewel
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Mudkip, Marshtomp, and Swampert.  Swap a Mudkip Mud and a Mudkip Card for a Mud Jewel at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
